data.content:
decorator修饰器语法

function log(target){}

function readonly(target,key,descriptor){}

function validate(target,key,descriptor){}

@log

class Animal{

    @readonly PI = 3.1415926;

    @validate add(...nums){

        return nums.reduce((a,b)=>(a+b),0)

    }

}

这里要安装依赖 yarn add babel-plugin-transform-class-properties babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy -D

module: {
        rules: [
            {
                test: /\.js$/,
                exclude: /node_modules/,
                use: {
                    loader: 'babel-loader',
                    options: {
                        presets: ['env'],
                        plugins: ['transform-decorators-legacy','transform-class-properties']
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
